name: Alone? (itch) (drnoir)
description:
How do I get out of this black hole?

And what are those strange white stars twinkling in the distance?
I think I see some red and green hues too,
what to do, what to do....
where is my beloved? As if death were not 
bad enough... those red demons don't look friendly as well
Am I alone?

A simple portal game created for feelings and emotions game jam
